tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Madhuri Sumanth, a skilled gynecologist at Aksha Hospital, is an exceptional medical professional. During my consultation for heavy bleeding, she listened attentively, ensuring a thorough understanding before recommending a hysterectomy. Her expertise and compassion set her apart, creating a safe, comfortable environment that instills deep trust. She is available for her patients 24x7, and she sees the problem through to the end, ensuring complete resolution and patient satisfaction.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Pregnancy,Cesarean Delivery,
review: Consulted by reference, from day 1 doctor treats you the best until you deliver the baby and also beyond that during your postpartum. She has a positive aura which helps you heal. Extremely friendly and welcomes you with a great vibe . I had previous miscarriages , No other doctors could find the exact cause why I was unable to succeed my pregnancy to term , but Dr.Madhuri is the only person who took personal care as she is extremely knowledgeable in her field, and helped me in bringing my pregnancy to term and I was able to deliver a healthy baby boy . Thank you doc for making me called to be a mommy ‚ù§Ô∏è

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am writing this review after 6 months. As it was my first pregnancy I was looking for good doctor who can do normal vaginal delivery. I was already consulting one Dr. near my house and was not much satisfied as there was no friendly interaction between patient and Dr. So my husband got suggestion from his friend about Dr. Madhuri. Initially I was worried to change Dr in 8th month but when i visited her for first time Dr. Madhuri made me comfortable and promised me that she will do normal delivery. As promised she helped me deliver healthy baby boy. I personally recommend her to all my family and friends. Thank you Dr for your support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
********** ** *** ** *** **** ******* **** **** ******* She has a lot of patience, she listens to each and every word and gives the best advice and treatment.  
The best part is she is very assuring and optimistic and that‚Äôs what helped me overcome my health issues. 
I‚Äôd definitely recommend Dr Madhuri as she‚Äôs best in her field and she can make anyone feel better with her ever smiling face and positive aura around her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
It was my first pregnancy and we were searching for good doctor near my house. Practo helped us to choose Dr. Madhuri Sumanth.

At the first visit itself we were very happy with her consultation.

Dr Madhuri is very friendly and feels like talking to a family member and take cares of everything which is necessary. She helped me to enjoy my pregnancy without any struggle and we are grateful to her that she was available to solve my concerns anytime in phone/whatsapp

We are very much thankful to her as I did not face any complications throughout my pregnancy or during delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: It was my first pregnancy and we were searching for good doctor near my house. Practo helped us to choose Dr. Madhuri Sumanth. At the first visit itself she gave us confidence. Earlier I thought to have medical check ups in Bangalore and get the delivery done at my native. But we changed our decision to get it done in bangalore because Of the comfort and the confidence she gave. She helped me to enjoy my pregnancy without any struggle and we are grateful to her that she was available to solve my concerns anytime in phone/watsapp. She delivered me by C-section and i was discharged in 3 days. I am thankful to Doctor that I did not face any complications throughout my pregnancy, during delivery and even after delivery. *** **** ****** ** ******* ** ** ****** * **** ******. I would recommend her to any mommies to be.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was very scared of having a child, since giving birth to a child is one of the most intense experiences the body can go through. But having a doctor like Dr.Madhuri beside me throughout this process, who treats you as your sibling, felt comfortable...especially when I was feeling anxious, unsure, excitable, and overwhelmed.Thank you so much for making this scary and life changing process so uncomplicated and easy. Thank you for being available anytime in person and on phone/WhatsApp. We really appreciate all that you have done to make this experience beautiful. You are not only an extraordinary doctor but also an extraordinary human being.P.S: I had a normal delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: like any other first time mom to be I was not sure whom to consult once I got the gd news. after reading reviews about many gynaecologists I chose Dr. Madhuri but had to visit one other doctor in emergency when I had bleeding in my early pregnancy. but in my 8th month that doctor told me that in the mid of my 9th month she will do cesarean bcz I had gestational diabetes. n thn I decided to change the gynaecologist. m happy that I went to Dr. Madhuri. shez very amicable n listens to her patient carefully n answers all the doubts.  10 days back I delivered a healthy baby girl normally. all thanks to Dr. Madhuri. I will highly recommend her n trust me u will b satisfied.
reply_text: Thank you so much Farhana for the valuable feedback . Gives us a lot of positive energy to treat our patients in a right way.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

God bless doctor like these. Where as we have other doctors who just talks to u like u hv committed some crime, we want more doctor like Dr.Madhuri.
